replaceStrings.replace: import React from 'react'; \n import ReactComponent from "../../../react-utils/component";

core-task.name: run
core-task.info: used to start external processes (like servers)

core-task.name: stop
core-task.info: stop a process started with "run" (only works for tasks that use wait:false)

core-task.name: wait
core-task.info: wait for a process started with "run" to close (only works for tasks that use wait:false)
